Check out my github repo for installation
The package now is compacted using
, so now we need some "special" extractor. So, in my case, I've downloaded this
Extract the content to your git bash installation dir:
language-bash shiki shiki-themes one-dark-pro one-dark-pro one-light
So, this step is important, it seems
will ask a few configurations, like the tab completion, history, etc. Please read the options and set that according to your use.
Installing oh-my-zsh, execute the following cmd on git bash
file. (create it if it doesn't exist)
Add the following lines at the end of the file

# Launch Zsh
if [ -t 1 ]; then
exec zsh
fi
Close and open again the git bash.
